safetyTips: We wear masks & gloves when packing & delivering. We offer contactless delivery.

description: Fruit and veg, eggs, milk, butter, jam, marmalade, banana bread, homemade sourdough, kombucha, granola, chia & mango pots, and more. Minimum spend of Â£25.
